verses.text: \w Therefore|strong="G1352"\w* \w leaving|strong="G0863"\w* the principles \w of|strong="G0746"\w* the \w doctrine|strong="G3056"\w* of \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, let us go \w on|strong="G5342"\w* \w unto|strong="G1909"\w* \w perfection|strong="G5047"\w*; \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w laying|strong="G2598"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w* the \w foundation|strong="G2310"\w* of \w repentance|strong="G3341"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w dead|strong="G3498"\w* \w works|strong="G2041"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* of \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w toward|strong="G1909"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*,

Of the \w doctrine|strong="G1322"\w* of \w baptisms|strong="G0909"\w*, \w and|strong="G5037"\w* of laying \w on|strong="G1936"\w* of \w hands|strong="G5495"\w*, \w and|strong="G5037"\w* of \w resurrection|strong="G0386"\w* of the \w dead|strong="G3498"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w of|strong="G2917"\w* \w eternal|strong="G0166"\w* \w judgment|strong="G2917"\w*.
\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w* will we \w do|strong="G4160"\w*, \w if|strong="G1437"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w permit|strong="G2010"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \add it is\add* \w impossible|strong="G0102"\w* for those who \w were|strong="G5461"\w* \w once|strong="G0530"\w* \w enlightened|strong="G5461"\w*, \w and|strong="G5037"\w* have \w tasted|strong="G1089"\w* of \w the|strong="G1431"\w* \w heavenly|strong="G2032"\w* \w gift|strong="G1431"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* were \w made|strong="G1096"\w* \w partakers|strong="G3353"\w* of \w the|strong="G4151"\w* \w Holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w Ghost|strong="G4151"\w*,

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* have \w tasted|strong="G1089"\w* \w the|strong="G4487"\w* \w good|strong="G2570"\w* \w word|strong="G4487"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G5037"\w* the \w powers|strong="G1411"\w* of the \w world|strong="G0165"\w* to \w come|strong="G3195"\w*,

\w If|strong="G2532"\w* they shall fall \w away|strong="G3895"\w*, to renew \w them|strong="G0340"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w repentance|strong="G3341"\w*; seeing they \w crucify|strong="G0388"\w* to \w themselves|strong="G1438"\w* the \w Son|strong="G5207"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w afresh|strong="G0388"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w put|strong="G3856"\w* \add him\add* to an open \w shame|strong="G3856"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* the earth \w which|strong="G1093"\w* drinketh \w in|strong="G4095"\w* the \w rain|strong="G5205"\w* that \w cometh|strong="G2064"\w* \w oft|strong="G4178"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* bringeth \w forth|strong="G5088"\w* \w herbs|strong="G1008"\w* \w meet|strong="G2111"\w* for \w them|strong="G1565"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* it is \w dressed|strong="G1090"\w*, \w receiveth|strong="G3335"\w* \w blessing|strong="G2129"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*:

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* that which \w beareth|strong="G1627"\w* \w thorns|strong="G0173"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w briers|strong="G5146"\w* \add is\add* \w rejected|strong="G0096"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add is\add* nigh \w unto|strong="G1451"\w* \w cursing|strong="G2671"\w*; \w whose|strong="G3739"\w* \w end|strong="G5056"\w* \add is\add* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* be \w burned|strong="G2740"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w*, \w beloved|strong="G0027"\w*, we are \w persuaded|strong="G3982"\w* better \w things|strong="G2909"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* things that \w accompany|strong="G2192"\w* \w salvation|strong="G4991"\w*, \w though|strong="G2532"\w* \w we|strong="G2980"\w* \w thus|strong="G3779"\w* \w speak|strong="G2980"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \add is\add* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w unrighteous|strong="G0094"\w* to \w forget|strong="G1950"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w work|strong="G2041"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w labour|strong="G2873"\w* of \w love|strong="G0026"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* ye have \w shewed|strong="G1731"\w* \w toward|strong="G1519"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w name|strong="G3686"\w*, in that ye have ministered \w to|strong="G1247"\w* the \w saints|strong="G0040"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* do \w minister|strong="G1247"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* we desire \w that|strong="G1937"\w* every \w one|strong="G1538"\w* of \w you|strong="G5216"\w* do \w shew|strong="G1731"\w* \w the|strong="G4710"\w* \w same|strong="G0846"\w* \w diligence|strong="G4710"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* the full \w assurance|strong="G4136"\w* of \w hope|strong="G1680"\w* \w unto|strong="G0891"\w* the \w end|strong="G5056"\w*:

\w That|strong="G2443"\w* ye \w be|strong="G1096"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w slothful|strong="G3576"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w followers|strong="G3402"\w* of them \w who|strong="G2816"\w* \w through|strong="G1223"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w patience|strong="G3115"\w* \w inherit|strong="G2816"\w* the \w promises|strong="G1860"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w when|strong="G1861"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* made \w promise|strong="G1861"\w* to \w Abraham|strong="G0011"\w*, \w because|strong="G1893"\w* he \w could|strong="G2192"\w* \w swear|strong="G3660"\w* \w by|strong="G2596"\w* \w no|strong="G3762"\w* \w greater|strong="G3173"\w*, he \w sware|strong="G3660"\w* \w by|strong="G2596"\w* \w himself|strong="G1438"\w*,

\w Saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Surely|strong="G3375"\w* \w blessing|strong="G2127"\w* I will \w bless|strong="G2127"\w* \w thee|strong="G4571"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w multiplying|strong="G4129"\w* I will \w multiply|strong="G4129"\w* \w thee|strong="G4571"\w*.
\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w so|strong="G3779"\w*, after he had patiently \w endured|strong="G3114"\w*, he \w obtained|strong="G2013"\w* the \w promise|strong="G1860"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w* \w verily|strong="G3303"\w* \w swear|strong="G3660"\w* \w by|strong="G2596"\w* the \w greater|strong="G3173"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* an \w oath|strong="G3727"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w confirmation|strong="G0951"\w* \add is\add* to \w them|strong="G0846"\w* an \w end|strong="G4009"\w* \w of|strong="G0485"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w strife|strong="G0485"\w*.

\w Where|strong="G3739"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w willing|strong="G1014"\w* more \w abundantly|strong="G4054"\w* to \w shew|strong="G1925"\w* unto the \w heirs|strong="G2818"\w* of \w promise|strong="G1860"\w* the \w immutability|strong="G0276"\w* \w of|strong="G1012"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w counsel|strong="G1012"\w*, \w confirmed|strong="G3315"\w* \add it\add* by an \w oath|strong="G3727"\w*:

\w That|strong="G2443"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w two|strong="G1417"\w* \w immutable|strong="G0276"\w* \w things|strong="G4229"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \add it was\add* \w impossible|strong="G0102"\w* for \w God|strong="G2316"\w* to \w lie|strong="G5574"\w*, we might \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w a|strong="G3874"\w* \w strong|strong="G2478"\w* \w consolation|strong="G3874"\w*, who have fled for \w refuge|strong="G2703"\w* to lay \w hold|strong="G2902"\w* upon the \w hope|strong="G1680"\w* set before \w us|strong="G4295"\w*:

\w Which|strong="G3739"\w* \add hope\add* we \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* an \w anchor|strong="G0045"\w* of the \w soul|strong="G5590"\w*, \w both|strong="G5037"\w* \w sure|strong="G0804"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w stedfast|strong="G0949"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* which \w entereth|strong="G1525"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* that \w within|strong="G2082"\w* the \w veil|strong="G2665"\w*;

\w Whither|strong="G3699"\w* the \w forerunner|strong="G4274"\w* \w is|strong="G1525"\w* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* \w us|strong="G2257"\w* \w entered|strong="G1525"\w*, \add even\add* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \w made|strong="G1096"\w* an high \w priest|strong="G0749"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w ever|strong="G0165"\w* \w after|strong="G2596"\w* the \w order|strong="G5010"\w* of \w Melchisedec|strong="G3198"\w*.
